title:
Kiki and Kitty
Kitty (Elaine Crombie) costume
material_description: polyester, sequins, turkey feathers, Haus of Dizzy gold mirror earrings
brief_description: In Kiki and Kitty (2017), Kitty (Elaine Crombie) is Kiki’s (Nakkiah Lui) fairy god-vagina, who shimmers in this sensual, sequined ensemble to embody all the repressed sass and sauciness of Lui’s buttoned-down lawyer.
